definitions.definition: an entertainer whose act is designed to make an audience laugh.
examples: comic, comedienne, funny man, funny woman, humorist, gagster, stand-up a famous comedian

joker, jester, wit, wag, comic, wisecracker, jokester; Moreprankster, clown, fool, buffoon; informallaugh, hoot, riot; informal,card "Dad was such a comedian"Moreprankster, clown, fool, buffoon; laugh, hoot, riot; card Dad was such a comedian
